lyrics.text:
’Oua na’a ku li’aki
‘A hoku ‘Otua
‘I he’eku manavahē
Ki hoku tautea.

Ka ko ho huafa tapu
Te u tokanga ki ai;
Pea u fakaongo atu,
Ho’o ngāue lelei.

Pea u fai, pea u falala,
Ki ho’o Folofola,
Te ke ‘aofia ma’u pē,
Hoku laumālie.

Ko e mo’oni ‘aupito
Te ke malu’i au
Mo ke taukapo’i atu
Hoku laumālie.

Ka te u tatali ‘o kumi
‘I he angavaivai
‘A e ‘ofa mo’onia
‘A e ‘Afiona.
